attributes.action: legislate that trade secrets can never be given the protection of intellectual property
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: IP is justified as of general benefit to humanity. It is qualified by openness to criticism and wider development. Remunerative recompense for the sweat of the brow must be protected. But that is only so when that work is made generally available for general benefit. The converse is that it is a Public Nuisance to deny this openness and protection. Technology can and must provide the fix.
